content: Dr. Connor, the margin on the facial of #8 is slightly sub-gingival and obscured by tissue in the scan. Can you re-scan or should I trim the die manually?
Hi Sarah. I see what you mean. The patient is coming back tomorrow at 2 PM. I will re-scan and upload. Please put the case on hold.
Internal Note: This doctor prefers really tight contacts. I added +0.05mm offset.
